result:
.slots_container
	display: grid
	grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(4rem, 1fr))
	gap: 0.5rem

	.slot
		padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem
		background-color: white
		display: inline-block
		border-radius: 0.25rem
		font-weight: bold
		box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)
		text-align: center
		cursor: pointer

	.slot.active
		background-color: cornflowerblue
		color: white

	.slot.inactive
		opacity: 0.5
		cursor: not-allowed

sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.calendar_container
	calendar(ref="calendar")
	div.slots_wrapper
		h4.h4.margin Slots Available ({{$store.getters.booking.booking_date}})
		div.slots_container.margin(v-if="slots.length > 0")
			span(
				@click="time = slot"
				class="slot"
				:class="{'active':time==slot}"
				v-for="slot in slots") {{slot}}
</template>

<script>
import Calendar from '@/components/calendar.vue'
export default {
	components: {
		'calendar': Calendar
	},
	data () {
		return {

			time: '',
			slots: [
				'Slot 1', 'Slot 2', 'Slot 3'
			]
		}
	}
	
}
</script>
<style lang="sass" scoped>
.slots_container
	display: grid
	grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(4rem, 1fr))
	gap: 0.5rem

	.slot
		padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem
		background-color: white
		display: inline-block
		border-radius: 0.25rem
		font-weight: bold
		box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)
		text-align: center
		cursor: pointer

	.slot.active
		background-color: cornflowerblue
		color: white

	.slot.inactive
		opacity: 0.5
		cursor: not-allowed
</style>
